languages.text: Whenever the wielder {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}blocks{/g} an attack, the attacker must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: Когда персонаж {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}блокирует{/g} атаку, атаковавший выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала получает {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ослепление{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the wielder blocks an attack, the attacker must pass an Agility resistance test or become blinded for 1 round.

Whenever the wielder blocks an attack, the attacker must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

Whenever the wielder blocks an attack, the attacker must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text: On successful Block attacker must succeed at Agility (+0) or become Blinded for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: On successful Block attacker must succeed at Agility (+0) or become Blinded for 1 round.

languages.text: Kullanan kişi bir saldırıyı {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}blokladığında{/g} saldırgan, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}körleşir{/g}. Etkisi 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wielder {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}blocks{/g} an attack, the attacker must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Kullanan kişi bir saldırıyı blokladığında saldırgan, Çeviklik direnç testinden geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde körleşir. Etkisi 1 raunt sürer.

Kullanan kişi bir saldırıyı blokladığında saldırgan, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde körleşir. Etkisi 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer.

languages.text: Cada vez que el portador {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}bloquea{/g} un ataque, el atacante debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}cegado{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wielder {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}blocks{/g} an attack, the attacker must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el portador bloquea un ataque, el atacante debe superar una prueba de fortaleza de Agilidad o quedar cegado durante 1 asalto.

Cada vez que el portador bloquea un ataque, el atacante debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}cegado{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.

languages.text: 每当装备者{g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}格挡{/g}攻击时，攻击者都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}致盲{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wielder {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}blocks{/g} an attack, the attacker must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者格挡攻击时，攻击者都需要进行敏捷抗性检定，若未能通过检定，则会陷入致盲状态，持续一轮。
每当装备者格挡攻击时，攻击者都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}致盲{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

languages.text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}bloque{/g} une attaque, l'assaillant doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}, sans quoi il est {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}aveuglé{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wielder {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}blocks{/g} an attack, the attacker must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur bloque une attaque, l'assaillant doit réussir un test de résistance d'Agilité, sans quoi il est aveuglé pendant 1 round.

Chaque fois que l'utilisateur bloque une attaque, l'assaillant doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}, sans quoi il est {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}aveuglé{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

Chaque fois que l'utilisateur bloque une attaque, l'assaillant doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}, sans quoi il est {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}aveuglé{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text: 使用者が攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}ブロック{/g}すると、その攻撃者は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷性{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を受けなければならず、失敗すると1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}盲目{/g}になる。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wielder {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}blocks{/g} an attack, the attacker must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 使用者が攻撃をブロックすると、その攻撃者は敏捷性抵抗判定を受けなければならず、失敗すると1ラウンドの間盲目になる。
使用者が攻撃をブロックすると、その攻撃者は敏捷性抵抗判定を受けなければならず、失敗すると1ラウンドの間盲目になる。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}Blockt{/g} der Träger einen Angriff, muss der Angreifer eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} bestehen, um nicht 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}geblendet{/g} zu werden.

traits.locale_text: Blockt der Träger einen Angriff, muss der Angreifer eine Widerstandsprobe auf Beweglichkeit bestehen, um nicht 1 Runde lang geblendet zu werden.
